title: Special Charge Up
paragraphs: Special Charge Up is an ability in the Splatoon series.
Special Charge Up increases the rate the special gauge charges at when inking turf.
The number of ability points for Special Charge Up can be temporarily increased by Comeback.
This ability allows for more frequent deployment of specials. This ability is more effective for special weapons that need a large amount of points to charge.
Special Charge Up is the main ability of:
Special Charge Up is the main ability of:
Special Charge Up increases the rate at which the special gauge fills.
Special Charge Up is the main ability of:

- 2 Splatoon
